text:
C°VI/D - an ostinato for all
.
Don't miss this provocative and original musical interpretation of the painful journey that we are currently going through - arranged and performed from home, by the musicians of Orkestra Melayu Singapura Belia (the youth wing of Orkestra Melayu Singapura).
.
More at https://www.apart.sg/music/omsbelia-covid-ostinato
.
#TogetherapARTsg #apARTsgSeason7 | @orkestramelayusingapura #omsbella
